localisedText.ref: Something has gone wrong and we need close the app, if you just placed a wager you will not have lost any coins.
Something has gone wrong with this game and we need to close it, if you just placed a wager you will not have lost any coins.
It looks like Facebook is having some trouble talking to us, you will need to restart the game
We can't connect to our servers at the moment. Please try again.
We've had a problem processing your payment. You will not have been charged.
We've had some difficulty processing your payment, but we are still attempting to credit your account. If you haven't received your coins within 24 hours, please contact customer support.
Failed to log into Facebook. Please enable Lucky Gem Casino in the Facebook settings on your device.
Something has gone wrong, please try again.
We have updated the game and need to restart the app for you. If you just placed a wager, you will not have lost any coins.
Your favourite game has now been improved, click OK to get the latest update
An update is required to play this Slot
We're updating the game. Please check back in 5 minutes.
That spin seems to be taking longer than usual! Let's refresh the page and try again. If you just placed a wager, you will not have lost any coins.
As a special player you've earned an exclusive bonus!
You need to be connected to Facebook to use this feature. Click OK to connect to Facebook now!
Your session has expired due to inactivity, please click OK to continue and we will reload to game for you.
You can't send yourself a gift.
We had a problem that spin, please try spinning again.
We had a problem loading that game, please try again.
We had a problem that spin, please try again.
Your daily email bonus is ready to collect! Don’t forget to come back tomorrow! Click below to claim today’s bonus!
You need {num} more friends to play to unlock {name}!
You made progress on the {name} Badge
You have just unlocked the {name} Badge
You Need More Coins To Spin!
You need more coins to buy into this Tournament!
Which type of gift would you like to send?
Invite your friends to play Lucky Gem Casino
Hey! I’m playing Lucky Gem Casino - you’ll love it too! Come and join me now!
You have sent all the invites you are able to today. Try again tomorrow.
Share wedge boosts with your friends
Send your friends a FREE gift today!
Gift each friend once every 24 hours
Facebook will send the requests in groups of {limit}
Hey! Here are some free coins to play Slots! Click Accept to claim them!
Hey! Here are some Wedge Boosts for your Daily Spin! Click Accept to claim them!
You have sent this type of gift to all your friends today. Try again tomorrow.
You have sent coins to all your friends today. Try again tomorrow.
We are busy sending your coins, please try again later.
Would you like to send gifts back?
You have received {amount} wedge boost{s} from your friends!
Would you like to send wedge boosts back?
We seem to be having trouble sending coins at the moment.
You have received coin gifts from {numGifts} of your friends.
We've added {totalAmount} bonus coins to your account. How many coins will you get tomorrow?!
You have sent the maximum number of gifts for today - try again tomorrow
Unfortunately the gift you're trying to claim has already expired. Stay tuned for more great coin promotions!
Unfortunately the gift you are trying to claim was so popular it's already gone. Stay tuned for more great coin promotions!
You can't collect your own free coin gifts!
You've already collected that free coin gift!
We seem to be having trouble collecting your bonus at the moment.
we credited {coins} coins to your playing balance
We're sorry, something has gone wrong and we are unable to retrieve any coin offers for you at this time. Please try again soon.
Buy coins now with perfect discount now! its bloody good deal,what are you waiting for,just click the button to spend your money on that!
Do you want to spend 1 minute learning how our slot machines work?
You're just in time to collect your first bonus!
Now let's use those coins to play your first slot!
Click on the SPIN button to make your first spin!

LET'S GET STARTED WITH YOUR FIRST SLOT! 
 
 CLICK TIKI ISLAND!

MATCH SYMBOLS FROM LEFT TO RIGHT TO WIN! 
 
 CLICK SPIN TO START!

NOW LET'S BET ON ALL 20 PAYLINES! 
 
 CLICK BET MAX!

INCREASE YOUR COIN SIZE FOR BIGGER WINS! 
 
 TRY IT NOW!

BONUS ROUNDS HAVE THE BIGGEST WINS! 
 
 GOOD LUCK!

WELL DONE! 
 YOU'VE WON 50 COINS FOR A 3-SYMBOL WIN

GOOD JOB! 
 YOU'VE WON ON 3 DIFFERENT LINES!
Launch Full Screen mode to chat and play Mini Games with your friends!
Play the free PopCap slot based on the world's #1 puzzle game! Match rare gems for high scores, play bonus games, and win big with the Wheel of Riches!
Spin the ribbeting free slot based on the hit PopCap game! Collect badges, shoot Tiki Bosses, and play the Gamble bonus game for even bigger prizes. Tame the jungle today!
Play the explosive free slot based on the hilarious PopCap hit! Match googly-eyed chuzzles, collect badges, and go for extra Coins in the Reaction Bonus!
Spin the wordy free slot based on the hit PopCap game! Lineup letters, collect badges, and take control of Lex to battle for bigger bonuses!
Make a splash in the frenzied free slot based on the hit PopCap game. Spin your way to high scores and badges, plus feed the guppies for bonus Coins!
Take on the bank in this high rolling free slot based on the hit PopCap game! Crack safes, collect badges, and earn free spins on your way to big wins!
Explore this free slot based on the hit PopCap game! Win coins, collect badges, and go sightseeing to find hidden treasures across London!
Play the magical slot based on the hit PopCap game! Unlock the powers of legendary Peggle Masters and catch Extreme Fever for mega bonus wins!
Play the free reel spinning game MONOPOLY Party! Choose your lucky token and take a ride around the board to collect bonus Coins!
Ready, aim, spin! Play the classic ship-blasting game in a whole new way with BATTLESHIP Jackpot Command!
Take a trip to Egypt in Amazing Adventures: The Lost Tomb! Spin to win coins, collect free spins, and explore 3 epic bonus rounds!
Spin our exclusive VIP slot Big Money: High Roller! You can bet big, earn monster wins, collect free spins, and visit our Vault Bonus Round to stack up on gold!
Join Plants vs. Zombies for a spin at summer sports! Match beloved characters or pick your favorite events for big wins in the bonus round! Go for the Gold to multiply wins!
A unique slot experience based on the world's #1 puzzle game. Spin the match-3 cascading reels and you can earn Bejeweled Blitz Rare Gems, and max out the Bonus Meter to enter the bonus round!
Be the slot doctor, win big, and get to the electrifying Cavity Sam Pick-A-Part bonus round. But be sure you have a steady hand to max out your winnings!

Spin and live your dream lifestyle with MONOPOLY Millionaire Dynasty, based on the shimmering update to the classic game. Win big and top off the millionaire meter for a chance to visit the blinged-out bonus round!
Discover your Midas touch! Frolic in the Coin fountain, and match three chests brimming with treasure to make it to the bonus round for a chance at free spins — and a possible double bonus!

It’s Vegas, baby, and time to win big! With this new slot based on the hit PopCap game you’ll match aces, coins, and cherries for prodigious payouts. Hit the heights with free spins, 25 bet lines and a hidden object bonus round.
Clear the decks and win treasures in this colorful slot based on the hit Facebook game.
